version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

special_behaviour_rarity.description: 1 in this number chance for Things to get each special ability.

max_miniboss_tier.description: Maximum tier that minibosses can grow to. They start at tier 0.

crawler_merge_chance.description: 1 in this number chance every tick to attempt to merge.

burrowing.description: Most Things should be able to burrow if they cannot reach where they are trying to pathfind to.

maxGriefingHardness.description1: The maximum hardness that Things can break. Set to a negative value to disable all Thing block breaking.
maxGriefingHardness.description2: Blocks with negative hardness values can never be broken.
maxGriefingHardness.description3: To blacklist specific blocks, add to the thing_immune tag using a data pack.
